Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • Box
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A box that encompasses all x-coordinates such that minX <= x < maxX, and all y-coordinates such that minY <= y < maxY.

    This class was copied directly from a QuadTree example from the Internet at: http://kirstywilliams.co.uk/blog/2012/08/quadtrees-java-implementation/

    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Box

        public Box(double minX,
   double minY,
   double maxX,
   double maxY)
        Creates a new Box with the specified corner points.
        Parameters:
        minX - the smallest x-coordinate of the Box.
        minY - the smallest y-coordinate of the Box.
        maxX - the largest x-coordinate of the Box.
        maxY - the largest y-coordinate of the Box.

      • Box

        public Box(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D rect)
        Creates a new Box with the same dimensions and coordinates as the specified Rectangle2D.
        Parameters:
        rect - the specified Rectangle2D

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(double x,
               double y)
        Determines if the specified point is contained within this box.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point
        y - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside of this box; false otherwise

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Box box)
        Determines if the specified Box is contained within this box.
        Parameters:
        box - the Box to check for containment
        Returns:
        true if the specified Box is entirely enclosed by this Box, of if the specified Box is exactly equal to this Box; false otherwise

      • getBounds2D

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double getBounds2D()
        Returns a Rectangle2D.Double object with the same location and dimensions as this box.
        Returns:
        the Rectangle2D.Double equivalent of this box

      • intersection

        public Box intersection(Box r)
        Calculates the intersection of the specified Box with this one. Returns null if the Boxes do not overlap.
        Parameters:
        r - the Box to intersect with
        Returns:
        the largest Box contained in both the specified Box and in this Box; or if the rectangles do not intersect, null.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Box other)
        Determines if this Box intersects with the specified Box.
        Parameters:
        other - the Box with which to check intersection
        Returns:
        true if there is an intersection; false otherwise

      • union

        public Box union(Box b)
        Computes and returns the union of this Box and the specified Box.
        Parameters:
        b - the specified Box
        Returns:
        the smallest Box containing both the specified Box and this Box.

      • calcDist

        public double calcDist(double x,
              double y)
        Calculates the distance from the indicated coordinates to this Box.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate
        y - the y-coordinate
        Returns:
        the smallest distance from the coordinates to this Box; 0.0 if the coordinates are inside of this Box

      • scale

        public Box scale(double scaleX,
        double scaleY)
        Computes and returns a copy of this Box that is scaled as specified by the given scalars. The Box is scaled with respect to its centre.
        Parameters:
        scaleX - the scalar by which to stretch the Box widthwise
        scaleY - the scalar by which to stretch the Box heightwise
        Returns:
        the scaled version of this Box

      • toRectangle

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D toRectangle()
        Returns a Rectangle2D.Double object with the same dimensions and coordinates as this Box.
        Returns:
        a Rectangle2D.Double object identical to this Box.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the String representation of this Box.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representing this Box
